channel.title: Tops on Weston
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Weston

item.description: Tony Weston is an ICT veteran with a passion for technology. He has broad experience in the information technology industry with more than 25 years’ experience. Throughout his career, he has excelled at delivering technology solutions, technology leadership, and solving hard problems. He has strong interests in various tech such as Cosmology, Artificial Intelligence, Quantum Physics, and Embedded Systems. Tony holds an honours degree in Electrical Engineering from the University of Auckland, along with numerous industry certification’s.
